title: Targus Launches Eco-Friendly Backpack with Built-In Find My Locator to Easily Find Your Tech and Other Personal ... - PR Newswire
summary: Targus, a leading laptop case manufacturer, has launched the Cypress Hero Backpack with Find My Locator. This eco-friendly backpack features a built-in location module that seamlessly integrates with Apple's Find My network, allowing users to track their backpack through their iPhone, iPad, or Mac. The backpack is made from recycled materials, including 26 plastic bottles, making it a more sustainable option for consumers.
product_or_process: Cypress Hero Backpack with Find My Locator

title: Novelis Enters Long-Term Agreement to Supply Aluminum Beverage Can Sheet to The Coca-Cola System - PR Newswire
summary: Novelis, a leading sustainable aluminum solutions provider, has signed a long-term contract with Coca-Cola Bottlers' Sales & Services Company to supply aluminum can sheet for Coca-Cola's North American bottlers. This agreement includes a commitment to closed-loop recycling, highlighting both companies' dedication to sustainability. Novelis' new facility in Bay Minette, Alabama will be the first fully integrated aluminum manufacturing and recycling plant built in the U.S. in nearly 40 years, boasting an initial capacity of 600,000 tons of finished goods.
